author: Katherine Clarke
title: Renowned Ballerinaâ€™s Hamptons Home Listed for $37 Million
text:
The family of Sono Osato, once a renowned ballet dancer, is listing her Hamptons summer home for $37 million.
The traditional-style home sits on almost 4 acres on Quimby Lane in Bridgehampton, a quiet lane overlooking Sagg Pond. The 7,200-square-foot house has five bedrooms, all with fireplaces, and five full bathrooms and three half-baths. The estate includes a pool, a tennis court and 300 feet of frontage on the pond, where a small strip of sandy beach disappears and reappears with the tide. 
...
